item.title: How to Write Usefully
item.description: Summary A useful essay is one which is novel, correct, important, and strong: Novel: It should communicate a “new thing” (point of view, fact, opinion, etc) to at least some of its audience. Correct: Your point(s) should be correct; to the extent which is possible. Important: The point(s) Notes What should an essay be? … useful. Useful writing tells people something true and important that they didn’t already know, and tells them as unequivocally as possible.
